name: Bright Minds
longDescription: Bright Minds provides customized learning programs for children with dyslexia...

name: Focus First
shortDescription: Coaching children with ADHD to focus better.
longDescription: Focus First uses behavior-based coaching for children and teens with ADHD...

name: Clear Pathways
shortDescription: Tailored programs for children with autism.
longDescription: Clear Pathways offers structured learning and social skills development for children on the autism spectrum, using evidence-based techniques.

name: Speech Harmony
shortDescription: Expert speech therapy for children with communication difficulties.
longDescription: Speech Harmony provides personalized speech and language therapy to help children improve articulation, fluency, and comprehension.

name: Learning Steps
shortDescription: Support for children with various learning challenges.
longDescription: Learning Steps offers individualized education plans for children with dyslexia, dyscalculia, and other learning disabilities.

name: Behavior Balance
longDescription: Behavior Balance uses applied behavior analysis (ABA) to support children with emotional and behavioral difficulties.
